description:
Damien, the Omen-inspired horror television series from A&E, has been canceled.取材于经典恐怖片《凶兆》的A&E电视台美剧《恶魔之子》确定被砍。

Showrunner Glen Mazzara announced the show's cancellation on Twitter (via Variety), saying, "This hurts to say but Damien will not be getting a second season. Thank you from all of us to our amazing fans."本剧制片人Glen Mazzara在Twitter上宣布了这个消息，他在Twitter上说：“很伤心地告诉大家，《恶魔之子》不会有第二季。谢谢一直支持我们的粉丝们。”

Damien: Season 1 ran for 10 episodes, averaging a 0.32 rating and 817,000 viewer base. The show stars Bradley James as an adult Damien Thorn, providing a modern day take on The Omen's iconic Antichrist character.《恶魔之子》第一季一共10集，平均收视率为0.32/81.7万。剧中，Bradley James饰演成年的Damien Thorn，重新演绎《凶兆》中经典的反基督者这一角。

In addition to executive producing Damien, Mazzara, who formerly worked on AMC's The Walking Dead, wrote the show.而该局的执行制片人Damien和Mazzara之前曾经是AMC著名美剧《行尸走肉》的编剧。

Despite Damien's cancelation, fans of The Omen still have something to look forward to, as Fox is developing a prequel film to the 1976 horror classic.虽然《恶魔之子》被砍，不过粉丝们还是可以继续期待这个系列，因为FOX有把这个1976年老牌恐怖片重新拍电影的计划。

title: 《恶魔之子》被砍！没有第二季！

description:
A Greek Army sergeant who saved 20 migrants from drowning off the coast of the island of Rhodes has been given an award for his bravery. Antonis Deligiorgis went back into the sea repeatedly after the boat which was carrying 93 people hit rocks and began to capsize. A photograph of him rescuing a young Eritrean woman was shown around the world. On the line from Rhodes, Antonis told me through an interpreter when he first realised something was wrong.

Before the incident I was just walking on the road and suddenly I heard a whole host of ambulances with their sirens wailing. So I followed them and I went to the place. And as I reached there I saw that there were about 25 to 30 people on the beach, wearing life vests. And there were more in the water, calling for help. So I waded in and immediately tried to start helping them.

And what were conditions like in the water?

The conditions were very difficult. It was very very rough. And there was a lot of debris in the water. There was diesel, there was mattresses, there were broken pieces of wood, and then other fishing boats also arrived. There were other citizens also trying to help. So generally the situation was very chaotic and very difficult and quite rough conditions.

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

       

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Barge in
To barge in means to intrude. What or who is barging in? What is the reason? What will be the outcome? Where does the action take place?
This week's topic: They barged into the room... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) the police barged into a warehouse
2) robbers barged into a bank
3) barge into a conversation
4) barge into a party uninvited
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Shawn made a beeline towards his office door and locked it. He highly doubted anyone else had arrived yet, other than himself and the one co-worker he encountered, when it was still so early in the morning, but then again, one would never know. Shawn would not want anyone barging in when he was in the middle of something. One rule was that one could never be careful enough. Besides, when Shawn was about to do might take quite some time. By then, some of the co-workers might start arriving.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
